Index.title: TinyKit - Crafting Minimalist & Practical Apps
Index.heroDesc: Discover TinyKit, where we build simple, beautiful, and effective tools designed to streamline your daily digital life without the clutter.
Index.fileSortifyDesc: Smart file organization for Mac. Automatically sort and organize your files with custom rules and real-time monitoring.
Index.aiHairstyleDesc: New 'Do, New You. Try on hundreds of hairstyles instantly with AI. Experiment with different cuts, colors, and styles risk-free.
Index.comingSoonDesc: We are working on more productivity tools for you. Stay tuned!
